channel.title: [PI] Hit through prayer [PI]
channel.description: how do i make it so a npc can hit through melle and range prayer?

item.title: [PI] Hit through prayer [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Something like this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC_ID) {
	if (!c.prayerActive[PRAYER_ID]) {
		int dam = Misc.random(max);
		c.dealDamage(dam);
		c.handleHitMask(dam);							
	} else {
		int min = Misc.random(max/3);
		c.dealDamage(min);
		c.handleHitMask(min);
	}
}

This will make it hit high without the prayer activated, but hit low with it.
Remember to change the following constants: NPC_ID, and PRAYER_ID.

Read full topic
